rows.label: tlk70000004_05_msg0001
rows.name:
Hope you don't take this the wrong
way... I don't want to doubt a Iiran
victory, but...it's a bit unlikely, right?

rows.label: tlk70000004_05_msg0002
rows.name:
When the time comes, please promise
to take care of yourselves, won't you?

rows.label: tlk70000004_05_msg0003
rows.name:
The great power of Shiya also
crumbled. Not easy to be hopeful
about the future, is it?

rows.label: tlk70000004_05_msg0004
rows.name:
And if Iiran power gets ground down,
Superbia will come to the fore, no
doubt about it!

rows.label: tlk70000004_05_msg0005
rows.name:
If they have nobody to challenge them,
they might go after Gula first... And
some Iirans think of fleeing there.

rows.label: tlk70000004_05_msg0006
rows.name:
The result of this battle is not the be
all and end all. If you can, I want you
to think about what happens after.
